name: Road Trip (joot)
description:
This prototype was completed for a Game-A-Week class where we have to complete a game on a specific topic/ theme within the week! 

This week's theme was: Camerawork (Week 5)

How to:

Mouse - look around

LMB - zoom

E - interact with objects and people

ALT F4 to exit game.

Trip with friends! More of a game than the previous week's one but still not polished and I could add more interactables. I may expand this in the future but this was all I could do in 1 week :)(VERY SHORT GAME)

Source:
